head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ANDORS, MYRTLE S.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ANDORS, MYRTLE S.

block.p: ANDORS-Myrtle S. Of Fort Lee, NJ. Beloved wife of Nathan. Devoted mother of Jay Andors and Beth Lesser. Cherished mother-inlaw of Steven Lesser. Loving grandmother of Rebecca Lesser, Jason Andors and Nicholas Andors. Dear sister and sister-in-law. Graveside service Friday, 1:00 PM, at New Montefiore Cemetery. For information call Gutterman-Musicant, 800-522-0588.
